snippet: Over a 70-year career, Ray Bradbury used his fecund storytelling talents to fashion tales that have captivated legions of young people and inspired a host of imitators.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani remembers Ray Bradbury, and the captivating science fiction writer's 70-year career.
lead_paragraph: Over a 70-year career, Ray Bradbury used his fecund storytelling talents to fashion tales that have captivated legions of young people and inspired a host of imitators.

headline.seo: Ray Bradbury, Who Made Science Fiction Respectable
headline.main: Up From the Depths of Pulp and Into the Mainstream
headline.print_headline: Up From the Depths of Pulp and Into the Mainstream
